query:
SELECT 
  po.customerOrderNumber,
  po.status as order_status,
  pw.waveNumber,
  pw.status as wave_status,
  COUNT(pwi.id) as total_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as picked_items
FROM pickingOrders po
LEFT JOIN pickingWaves pw ON po.waveId = pw.id
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pw.id = pwi.waveId
WHERE po.customerOrderNumber LIKE 'PED-%'
GROUP BY po.id, po.customerOrderNumber, po.status, pw.waveNumber, pw.status
ORDER BY po.id DESC;

  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as picked_items
FROM pickingOrders po
LEFT JOIN pickingWaves pw ON po.waveId = pw.id
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pw.id = pwi.waveId
